txt.en: 'One of the many duties of the Rangers of Esteld√≠n is to watch over a place known as the Shire. I recently received word that the Hobbits of Michel Delving, calling themselves the Mathom Society, have begun asking traders and merchants for a variety of...interesting items.\n\n'If you would, travel to the Shire and find out exactly what this Mathom Society is up to. I have heard that a hobbit named Greylond Bottomley has been taking the orders. You should seek him out.'
'You were sent to help us locate mathoms? How wonderful, I am sure we can put you to work right away.'
'You should journey to the Shire and speak with Greylond Bottomley at the Mathom House.'
Hithlim has asked that you speak with Greylond Bottomley outside the Mathom House in Michel Delving.
Talk to Greylond Bottomley at the Mathom House
Greylond Bottomley can be found outside the Mathom House in Michel Delving.\n\nHithlim has asked that you speak with Greylond Bottomley to find out what the Mathom Society is up to.
